name: Cops and Robbers Bank Game
description:
Gear up for the grand heist of the year with blockbuster game, it’s a first person shooting game. Stand against police lead the notorious mafia gangster squad to become bank robbery master. Take title of underworld king in the crime city make grand escape. Enjoy epic bank robbery game in city. A grand crime game full of action missions of looting banks jewelry shops and much more. Build a criminal underworld where unknown player can rob city banks with mafia gang. Live in criminal world, join a bank robbery gang to show a real city of gangster squad.

The one who is the real boss in this crime arena. Play this game, fight with police squad, SWAT team and security guards to rule the streets of modern city in this action packed bank robbery game. Play as unknown player, your main duty in crime mission game is to steal money from bank and loot all the jewel shops.
Features:
Infinite robbery missions
Extreme shooting missions
Polygonal art style city environment
Smooth controls for precise shooting
High quality 3D graphics and immersive gameplay



Download this game and give us your feedback, so we can make more gangster squad bank robbery games.
